audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop

name: Fluidity Timer

screenshots.caption: You can access an advanced Panel if you click the timer display
You can customize the look and also access a prelim bracket calculator

short_description:
This is a free, open-source timer for the LD community. Contributions in code, suggestions for features, and feedback on any annoyance no matter how small are encouraged.


November 23rd Update:
- Saves user preferences
- Audio alarm has been added
- Made the prelim bracket calc more accurate
- Fixed the bug where "set" wouldn't work
- Allows the user ability to set a specific default location

Things to expect in the next update:
- User can select other speech and debate events. This preference will be saved and treated like a default. People who only do LD won't even see this feature if they'd prefer not to.
- Ability for user to select their own audio file to use as an alarm. It'll probably be limited to .wav formats until an update later
- Anything you guys suggest
summary: A slick timer with community-tailored features.
